values.value: +2 dice for detection and illusion spells; +2 dice for conjuring all Spirits of Man.

Rat is a stealthy thief who is too selfish to share anything, even with his companions. He is also a reluctant warrior who would rather run than fight. Where mankind goes, there also goes Rat, for who else's bounty can sustain him?

Rat shamans are usually dirty and unkempt. Rat is a coward , but when he must fight, he fights to kill. Rat dlsllkes worklng out in the open, for a muttered spell from the shadows (or a silenced pistol from a doorway) is more his style. Subtract 1 die for combat spells.
